BootstrapTextblock.Title: OpenCms Introduction: Step 4 - Link to Step 5

Text.name: Text0
Text.content:
OpenCms features a device preview that allows you to easily see how the page will look e.g. in a iPad or smartphone. Just click on the Show menu icon on the toolbar, and there select for example Show in device > Mobile > iPhone (landscape). A preview is shown for the selected device.

To close the preview, just click anywhere outsite the highlighted area.
